hotel_name: Deface Platinum 2 Kuala Lumpur
title: λ³΄ν†µβ€
content:
Stayed there for one night for a layover.

Hotel looks nice and fancy, room accompanied a bad paint smell which when I questioned they said all rooms are same so I guess it is related to how new the building is.

Check in took forever and general vibe I got from staff were very unwelcoming and they were quiet reluctant to serve you and seemed like they purposely neglected until one of their co workers served us.

Insane reminders about hotel deposit policy were also made us a little uncomfortable.

hotel_name: λ° λ£¨λ‚ νΈν…” μ¤λ¦¬ ννƒλ§ (De Luna Hotel Sri Petaling)
title: Great for price β€
content: Suitable place to stay if there is event near mranti park area.. About 10 minutes drive.. Lots of eatery next and nearby.. They provide netlfix on tv.. Basic room quite small but bed is comfortable.. Shower temperature not so great in adjustability.. Overall stay is great for the price u pay..

hotel_name: λ° λ£¨λ‚ νΈν…” μ¤λ¦¬ ννƒλ§ (De Luna Hotel Sri Petaling)
title: Only good for sleep and luggage keeping β€
content: If you're looking for a place to just rest for the night and to keep your stuff during your trip, then this place is okay for that reason. Had a 2D1N stay here. The hot water was not working, so we showered with cold water only. The door seems to be problematic, we had to remove the card and slot it in (for a few times) because the door alarm kept on ringing. One of the lights in the room was out. Other than that, the room is okay for resting.

title: Overall okβ€
content: Location is ok, hotel is all good, deco are nice and all. The only downside is maybe they dont have lift but it is okay. Receptionist are all good, overall will likely to repeat again. :)

hotel_name: λ° λ£¨λ‚ νΈν…” μ¤λ¦¬ ννƒλ§ (De Luna Hotel Sri Petaling)
title: samll rooms... extra service chargeβ€
content:
I ordered twin room, I got very small one, barely fit the the two beds and without window. 
No hot water in the bathroom, the flush of the sink toilet was very slow to refill.
I would appreciate if agoda highlights the extra service charge in the booking page.

hotel_name: λ° λ£¨λ‚ νΈν…” μ¤λ¦¬ ννƒλ§ (De Luna Hotel Sri Petaling)
title: normalβ€
content: okok

hotel_name: λ° λ£¨λ‚ νΈν…” μ¤λ¦¬ ννƒλ§ (De Luna Hotel Sri Petaling)
title: It was okβ€
content: I requested a non smoking room and I got a room smelled terrible of smoke. I asked if I could get another room they said no because I was staying for 3 nights. Instead they gave me some fabric spray and perfume for the room. No housekeeping was done because it must be requested. When I returned to my room at 7pm and requested for housekeeping to be done, they cannot accommodate because housekeeper is off duty and I requested for fresh towels and blanket but I got some thin cloth as blanket. The toilet bowl was leaking and was unable to flush properly.

content: Good for just sleep. Didn't feel clean but no insects, so was okay. No hot water, had to take shower with cold water which may catch a cold. hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: μµκ³ β€
content: Third time staying at this hotel bcoz it is convenient.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Not worth. Waste money. Not clean. Not safe. Very cheap hotelβ€
content: Smoke detector has been altered by previous occupant. Dont know when. Probably long2 ago. Maybe they smoking that why smell abit of smoke. They dont even try to remove the toilet paper stuck on in.. 2nd the price is high when compared with other hotel. No tooth brush. No hair cap. No indoor shoes. No refill tea and coffee.. and refill two small water bottle. Not spot clean. I think it govt servant hotel. Lot of lecturers and other govt servant coming there. Haven't seen anyone for leasure during our visit. Food below average. They charge rm 90 per person. Luckily we got the package. I dare to say this because i had a lot of hotel before. With this price range. I expect better. But rly disappointing. This is the last time coming there. Should have book elsewhere. I wish i can upload the pictures i took inside the hotel. U all be surprised

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Everything good except below bedβ€
content: below bed very dusty, please check every room ya

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Not the most strategic placeβ€
content: Had a 3D2N stay here. The air conditioning seems to be centralized because I couldn't find any way to adjust the temperature. Throughout my stay the room was lukewarm almost and it got me sweating while sleeping. The breakfast was fine, nothing extraordinary. Overall, the place looks good on the website, but so-so when you're actually staying. I will give credit to the receptionists/staff as they were very friendly and helpful when I called in and asked if I left my binocular in the room. They helped me checked and got back to me.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Great hotelβ€
content: The ambience and interior decoration is great. The room is clean and comfortable. Good choice

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: μµκ³ β€
content:
Excellent stay
We had a great stay at this property. The location was convenient and the facilities were exceptional. The staff were friendly and helpful, making our stay even more enjoyable. The cleanliness of the property was impressive and we felt that we got good value for our money. We would highly recommend this property to anyone visiting the area.

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: NOT RECOMMEND AT ALLβ€
content:
I went to this hotel a month ago, the receptionist doesn't even bother to explain about their facility and etc. 
One of the frustrating is the parking, they never explain about their parking will be only RM1 but you need to wave your card at the counter, and I was being charged RM11 for 2 hours parking because they never bother to explain during check in, 
I went to ask the receptionist after such charges, and they said will refund me, it has been a month and the money is not even refunded despite I contacted them, worst experience ever, there are many hotels outside, you don't need to suffer yourself being in this hotel , please ! FROM THE LEGIT CUSTOMER !

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Very bad staying experienceβ€
content: Room is so dirty, very dusty, spiderweb everywhere at the corner of the room, blood stains on duvet, bathroom alsoβ€¦ stains everywhere. Requested to change room but only managed to change new bedsheet and duvet. Call to front desk, they are not attentive at all, pick up my call and then drop it. Asked to change but waited half hour not coming, personally go down to the front desk and talk to them only the housekeeping managed to come. Buffet breakfast limited choices, utensils bowls and plates all very dirty! Check in process is so slow, Paula the front desk just taking her own sweet time. Srsly avoid this dirty place, very disgusting

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: sissy male staff not friendlyβ€
content: when he looks you like not rich people and came from east malaysia, he not treat you well and I ask where is the room he just said use the lift and at first I can't find the room in level 1 , he not explain well where is the room

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: I have been conβ€
content: They sold my room. Drove all the wat there and they did not call me for the room situation. Wasted time and money. They even trying to make hoax story that there was error on system. Im very unsatisfied with the service

hotel_name: Park Inn by Radisson Putrajaya
title: Dirty with spider webs and antsβ€
content: The room that they gave us was invested with ants in the floor, table and hanging clothes area. Then we complain about it to the staff but the staff did not smile and apologize. However, we got upgraded to the bigger room. We found ants and the spider webs.

hotel_name: Attic Home Melaka Imperio Residence & Jonker
title: Deluxe Suite with private poolβ€
content: I stayed for 2 nights and feels its not enough! The apartment was so spacious and clean. Got a high floor apartment that gave a nice scenery and windy. The best part for my kids was the private pool in the room. There's a small room outside the pool area for my kids to sleep and get changed. The check in/out for my stay was easy and smooth. Imperio staff was friendly and helpful to any enquiries. Overall its a worthy stay.

content: I recommend to stay in . The room was completely perfect with all the aminies that you provided. Also its very comfortable and clean. Thank you cause give a good services and fast response. Will come back again .

hotel_name: Attic Home Melaka Imperio Residence & Jonker
title: Easy check-in, great location butβ€¦β€
content:
Opted deluxe room but itβ€™s furthest from lift at least 2-3min away. Carpark was v dark and twice almost ran into other cars as we canβ€™t even see the direction properly.
lift corridors r dirty n look like dorms. The 2nd toilet had v foul smell, I had to buy my own Febreeze from Mr DIY n used half a bottle to reduce the odor. 
Tried this place as it has 2br for myself n my parents with 9.1 star ratings.
Based on experience, Iβ€™d rather pay for Hatten Hotel in next trip
Donβ€™t be fooled by the high ratings..!

hotel_name: Imperio Residence Private Bathtub @ Melaka Town
title: Cozy and fully utilized.β€
content:
One of the best stay in Melaka, the room is super cozy and got numbers of facilities to use such as washing machine and mini kitchen. Not to forget the fridge too. The bathroom? 10/10, the view? 10/10, chef kiss.

Overall its one of the best stay in Melaka π‘π» 

Highly recommended

content: Arrived at 3pm and said room not ready, 3.30pm check in the room like long time no ppl stay. Mafe complain about room so dusty, after an hour also never turn up. Finally at 5pm I move out, because the room can't stay.. Make me and my family feel so iretating and sick. Call to the PIC also very bad responses.
